quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
author: Aristotle
Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.

quote: In the first place, God made idiots. That was for practice. Then he made school boards.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
author: Maimonides

quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.
author: Diogenes

quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
author: Chanakya

quote: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change.
author: Carl Rogers

quote: The paradox of education is precisely this - that as one begins to become conscious one begins to examine the society in which he is being educated.
author: James Baldwin

quote: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Education is all a matter of building bridges.
author: Ralph Ellison

quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Data is not information, information is not knowledge, knowledge is not understanding, understanding is not wisdom.
author: Clifford Stoll

quote: Education is what survives when what has been learned has been forgotten.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: Everybody is ignorant, only on different subjects.
author: Will Rogers

quote: When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
author: Edward Everett

quote: Learning is a result of listening, which in turn leads to even better listening and attentiveness to the other person. In other words, to learn from the child, we must have empathy, and empathy grows as we learn.
author: Alice Miller

quote: No one has yet realized the wealth of sympathy, the kindness and generosity hidden in the soul of a child. The effort of every true education should be to unlock that treasure.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: Poor people cannot rely on the government to come to help you in times of need. You have to get your education. Then nobody can control your destiny.
author: Charles Barkley

quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life.
author: Plato

quote: It is a thousand times better to have common sense without education than to have education without common sense.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: All I want is an education, and I am afraid of no one.
author: Malala Yousafzai
If I were again beginning my studies, I would follow the advice of Plato and start with mathematics.

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: The philosophy of the school room in one generation will be the philosophy of government in the next.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
author: Allan Bloom

quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
author: Abigail Adams

quote: To read without reflecting is like eating without digesting.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
author: Victor Hugo
You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.

quote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: The illiterate of the future will not be the person who cannot read. It will be the person who does not know how to learn.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: An education isn't how much you have committed to memory, or even how much you know. It's being able to differentiate between what you know and what you don't.
author: Anatole France

quote: My mother said I must always be intolerant of ignorance but understanding of illiteracy. That some people, unable to go to school, were more educated and more intelligent than college professors.
author: Maya Angelou
A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life.

quote: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.
author: Robert M. Hutchins

quote: It is better to know some of the questions than all of the answers.
author: James Thurber

quote: Self-education is, I firmly believe, the only kind of education there is.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: I would rather entertain and hope that people learned something than educate people and hope they were entertained.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Men and women must be educated, in a great degree, by the opinions and manners of the society they live in.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: What sculpture is to a block of marble, education is to the soul.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: If a man's wit be wandering, let him study the mathematics.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: The mere imparting of information is not education.
author: Carter G. Woodson

quote: I tell students that the opportunities I had were a result of having a good educational background. Education is what allows you to stand out.
author: Ellen Ochoa

quote: Responsibility educates.
author: Wendell Phillips
